foreignData.name: Siegel der Anerkennung
foreignData.text:
Das Siegel der Anerkennung kommt mit X Ladungsmarken ins Spiel.
Die ausgerüstete Kreatur erhält +1/+1 für jede Ladungsmarke auf dem Siegel der Anerkennung.
Ausrüsten Entferne eine Ladungsmarke vom Siegel der Anerkennung.

foreignData.name: Sello de distinción
foreignData.text:
El Sello de distinción entra en juego con X contadores de carga sobre él.
La criatura equipada obtiene +1/+1 por cada contador de carga sobre el Sello de distinción.
Equipar—Remover un contador de carga del Sello de distinción.

foreignData.name: Sigille de distinction
foreignData.text:
Le Sigille de distinction arrive en jeu avec X marqueurs « charge » sur lui.
La créature équipée gagne +1/+1 for pour chaque marqueur « charge » sur le Sigille de distinction.
Équipement — Retirez un marqueur « charge » du Sigille de distinction.

foreignData.name: Sigillo di Onorificenza
foreignData.text:
Il Sigillo di Onorificenza entra in gioco con X segnalini carica.
La creatura equipaggiata prende +1/+1 per ogni segnalino carica sul Sigillo di Onorificenza.
Equipaggiare—Rimuovi un segnalino carica dal Sigillo di Onorificenza.

foreignData.name: 卓越の印章
foreignData.text:
卓越の印章は蓄積カウンターがＸ個置かれた状態で場に出る。
装備しているクリーチャーは、卓越の印章の上に置かれている蓄積カウンター１個につき＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
装備 ― 卓越の印章から蓄積カウンターを１個取り除く。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト — 装備品

foreignData.name: Insígnia de Distinção
foreignData.text:
Insígnia de Distinção entra em jogo com X marcadores de carga.
A criatura equipada recebe +1/+1 para cada marcador de carga em Insígnia de Distinção.
Equipar Remova um marcador de carga de Insígnia de Distinção.

foreignData.name: Медаль Отличия
foreignData.text:
Медаль Отличия входит в игру с Х жетонами заряда на ней.
Снаряженное существо получает +1/+1 за каждый жетон заряда на Медали Отличия.
Снарядить удалите один жетон заряда с Медали Отличия.

foreignData.name: 明辨印记
foreignData.text:
明辨印记进场时上面有X个充电指示物。
明辨印记上每有一个充电指示物，佩带此武具的生物便得+1/+1。
佩带～从明辨印记上移去一个充电指示物。

name: Sigil of Distinction
originalText:
Sigil of Distinction comes into play with X charge counters on it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Sigil of Distinction.
Equip—
Remove a charge counter from Sigil of Distinction.

rulings.text: Removing a charge counter from Sigil of Distinction is the only way to pay for its equip ability. If it has no charge counters on it, its equip ability can’t be activated.

If Sigil of Distinction is attached to a creature when its equip ability is activated targeting a different creature, the first creature will immediately get a little smaller because a charge counter has been removed from Sigil of Distinction as a cost. Then, when the equip ability resolves, Sigil of Distinction will move to the new creature and the first creature will lose the entire bonus the Equipment was giving it.

text:
Sigil of Distinction enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Sigil of Distinction.
Equip—Remove a charge counter from Sigil of Distinction.
